work.title: Work.
work.rancy: Freelance project for RancyHotels where I worked on main site (WordPress) and booking dashboard (Laravel and filament).
work.paulromhosting: Freelance project for paulromhosting where I turned Pterodactyl.io software into a game hosting store with credits.
work.linksevent: Freelance project for links event group, We worked on client area and admin area using nextjs, and the api using Laravel.
work.walkincity: A fun project for virtual walking over cities lets users explore cities online with no cost.
work.hamzaOS: Clone of my (linux) debian 12 kde as Webgui, all on client side nothing on the server.

descriptions.1: Worked on multiple Mern and Full-stack projects
Redesigned client's dashboard with ReactJS and Laravel
descriptions.2: Imported pterodactyl.io and timeweb.cloud APIs to the backend with Laravel.
descriptions.3: Contribute to the frontend dashboard with VueJS 3.

descriptions.1: Collaborated with a team of developers to develop modern and friendly web solutions
descriptions.2: Integrate payment gateways such as CMI / Paypal / Stripe and Youcan Pay.

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.0: My name is <0>{{name}}</0>, I'm a <1>{{age}}</1> year old from <2>{{country}}</2>.
aboutme.1: In <0>2020</0>, I began my career as a <1>Linux administrator</1>, which ignited my passion for <2>DevOps</2> and <3>Web development</3>. Now, as a <4>full-stack developer</4> with over two years of experience, I specialize in creating user-friendly websites and web applications using modern technologies.
